markdownRemark.html:
Here is a snippet of code to used to control a mouse using an Arduino.

#include "Mouse.h"

void setup() {
  Serial.begin(9600);
  Mouse.begin();
}

void loop() {
   Mouse.move(0, -40);
  delay(5000);
}
